title: More than 1m customers ‘overcharged’ by 18 energy suppliers
lead: Failures to protect customers’ tariff prices after energy switching led to an accumulative £7.2 million extra cost

title: ITM Power recruits engineers for its new gigafactory at Sheffield
lead: Successful candidates will be based at the new facility at Bessemer Park

title: Chevron invests in Swedish geothermal firm
lead: The investment in Baseload Capital underpins the oil and gas giant’s ambition to expand its clean energy offering

title: Can 250,000 green apprenticeships fix the youth unemployment crisis?
lead: A new report warns if the current youth unemployment rate remains the same for a year, it could cost the economy £39bn

title: Are green savings bonds the hidden gems in Rishi’s red Budget box?
lead: Government-backed green bonds will reportedly allow savers to fund projects that are in line with the ‘build back better’ campaign

title: Council rolls out ‘Litter Cams’ for litterbug drivers
lead: Motorists who are caught disposing of litter from their windows face fines of up to £120

title: SP Energy Networks completes £30m grid upgrade
lead: The work, which took place over the last two years, is part of SPEN’s modernisation programme to future-proof the electricity network and increase resilience of supply in the area

title: First power generated from 859MW Triton Knoll Offshore Wind Farm
lead: When fully commissioned, it will be capable of generating enough green electricity to power more than 800,000 homes

title: Rolls-Royce achieves new milestone towards world’s ‘fastest’ all-electric aircraft
lead: The taxiing of the plane is a critical test of the integration of the aircraft’s propulsion system, ahead of actual flight-testing, which has been planned for the Spring

title: Digitizing utility bill management affects every player
lead: Taking the decision to digitize the management of utility bills is a big step in reducing the administrative burden of bill processing in your organization.
